channel.title: GSD Mobile
channel.description: A RSS dedicated to monthly blog at GSD.

item.title: The New GSD Mobile
item.description: From a new user interface, to a revamped and dependable feed to mobile news and annoucnemnts; GSD Mobile now provides the community with news that matters to them! Click here to leave some feedback on the newly revamped update!

item.title: OTA Notifications
item.description: GSD Mobile will inform community members and followers of important app updates, news, and announcments! Keep tabs on your favorite app projects by GocalSD.

item.title: Sapphyx Launcher 2.0 Announced
item.description: The beans have been spilled, Sapphyx 2.0 is coming but very little about its ETA is known at this time. An Android Oreo enhancment will be coming before it's second anniversary release!

item.title: Sapphire Launcher 2018
item.description: An update has been released for Sapphire Launcher. Some features have been removed due to stability issues on Android 8.0 The Launcher is now LTS based. A future update is scheduled to improve performance and available features.

item.title: Sapphyx Launcher 2.0 Private Testing
item.description: A survey is available on the Sapphyx Launcher Google Plus Group. Complete the survey, and enter in a chance to be selected as an Alpha tester before release.
